text: Motion

...?
Haruki-chan, is that...

Ahaha, it's a photo of me.
Thet took it the other day.
Sorry, I saw it before you showed me...!
No worries.
Motion

This black and white photo
looks so cool, right...?
Haha, pros are amazing, aren't they?

You're amazing too, Hana-chan~
I can't help but admire you.

Hey, Hana-chan,
what color was your outfit in this picture?

Huh?
Um... what was it again?

It looks black, but then again, it might be something else...
blue, maybe?
Ahaha, I totally don't remember.
Hehe, I see.

The black of this outfit, the black of the background, hair
and shadows... They're all different shades of black, right...?

Yeah,
there are different colors within this black...
Motion

But because we can't see the colors, I feel like there
are things that can be seen from the subject's perspective...
Huh, like what?
I can't really put it into words...

Eh-?
I want to know-!
